name: ObstetricsVTESNOMEDCT
title: Obstetrics VTE SNOMED CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of diagnoses to identify patients who have venous thromboembolism (VTE) related to pregnancy or obstetrics.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis for venous thromboembolism related to pregnancy or obstetrics.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
